entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonConverter.Read call inside another converter throws InvalidOperationException: Cannot skip tokens on partial JSON. #74108
  • Cannot run .NET Core 3.1 apps in directories that end in dot on macOS #74105
  • Native build on s390x broken after PR #72394 #74102
  • Add support for running pipelines on PRs, with *arguments* #74096
  • When I use the IP the remote server refuse connection #74093
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf`: `wasm-opt` failing with `unexpected expression typeemcc`, and killed with `SIGSEGV (-11)` #74088
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-runtime-perf][wasm] `Perf_File.CopyToOverwrite` benchmark failing with `System.IO.IOException: File exists` #74104
  • [API Proposal]: password bytes PKCS8 PEM exports #74085
    8.0.0
  • Environment variable for summary of JIT info output to console #74084
    Future
  • OSR + dynamic PGO not optimizing interface dispatch as expected #74081
    8.0.0
  • Impersonation via Kerberos and HttpClient leads to TCP port exhaustion #74078
  • Test failures on runtime-extra-platforms on Android/iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #74076
    8.0.0
  • Missing risc-v implementations in mono mini #74071
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Crash related to stack unwinding while running System.Runtime test case #74069
  • Default AssemblyLoadContext resolves assembly on the 2nd attempt #74068
  • MakeNewCustomDelegate is not supported by NativeAOT #74067
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #74066
  • Nullability annotation missing on CacheControlHeaderValue.TryParse #74061
  • cannot open include file 'version_info.h' #74060
  • There is a delay bug in serial communication #74063
    Future
  • System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException (0x80131937): ERROR [0] #74059
  • F5 to run Blazor WebAssembly App project, register and log in on the web page, then log out, click login again, the web page will be crash. #74064
  • [ppc64le] New test RegexPcre2Tests added in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests testsuite is failing #74057
  • System.Threading.Ratelimiting does not effectively maximize requests for its parameters #74056
  • Quic Connect fails with weird error when connecting to IPv6 and AF not available #74053
  • System.Resources.ResourceManager is not thread safe when ignore case is enabled #74052
    Future
  • NetworkStream.BeginWrite has different buffer usage safety on Windows and Linux #74050
  • crash in JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on Mono #74049
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\DivConst_r\\DivConst_r.cmd #74044
  • Question: finding architecture using System.Reflection.Metadata #74040

Closed

  • Provide API XmlDsigC14NTransform.GetCanonicalBytes without need for hashalgorithm #21388
    Future
  • Feedback on ClaimsPrincipal handling of arrays and complex types #19578
    Future
  • Cross-Architecture publish user experience should be better #71395
    7.0.0
  • [Regression] System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink Equals broken in net7 preview #74026
    7.0.0
  • Remove dotnet8 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet9 feeds #74100
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure subtleCrypto is usable from Blazor app #72810
    8.0.0
  • AOT+LLVM throws for `Enum.GetUnderlyingType()` on Android in .NET 7 #68914
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_GetLength.ReturnsActualLengthForDevices(options: Asynchronous) #73925
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\Arm\\AdvSimd.Arm64\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r.cmd #65281
    7.0.0
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 7 #65260
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] MsQuic packaging #55639
    7.0.0
  • Provide a way to disable using subtle crypto on WebAssembly for the .NET crypto APIs #73386
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests failed in CI #60933
    7.0.0
  • Deserialize a JSON string with the property name had no quotes #74055
  • marshalling va_list crossplatform p/invoke binding #9316
    Future
  • Visual Studio 2022 Remote Testing -.NET Framework 4.8 is installed, yet the.NET cannot be found during testing. #73940
  • Accessing physical drives throws when accessing from the end and retrieving .Length #73669
    7.0.0
  • Vectorize the new {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept methods #67942
    8.0.0
  • Runtime silent installation progress #58307
  • bash: dotnet: command not found (.NET 6 installed on CentOS 7) #62208
  • Updating to the latest DF build (17.0.0 Preview 5 31801.437.main) results in broken .NET Core 3.1 component #66456
  • Issue using `dotnet trace` on MacCatalyst apps #73715
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf<*>.* has Regressed for Mono Interpreter Ubuntu 18.04 #73863
  • [mono] mono crash on ios #68849
    7.0.0
  • When I try to create a handler in the client for a gRPC service HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #73960
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Data #73722
    7.0.0
  • Compile error in TypeUtilTests.cs: The type 'Uri' exists in both System.Private.Uri and System.Runtime #73792
    7.0.0
  • UInt128 implicit casting #74001
  • Mono runtime allows running module ctor and class ctors multiple times through reflection #40351
    8.0.0
  • [net7][Wasm] Type.TypeInitializer.Invoke() does not run the type initializer #69516
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for issue 70330 #74112
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Don't track current field of state machines #74111
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert #70171 "Ensure that GT_CNS_VEC is handled in ..." #74110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix .net 6 framework packs to not have different names or aliases as that's not required or supported. #74109
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Set configureplatform.make prerelease to 0 #74103
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move dotnet7 feeds to dotnet8 in main nuget.config #74101
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add scheduled runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74099
    area-Build-mono, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #74098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing performance pipeline fix #74097
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a missing AssertMapAndKeyExist to repGetExactClasses #74095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't fail the test when the file is in use #74094
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] fix Android sample AOT=true build #74092
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #74091
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #68906 enable android x86 double related issues #74080
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • #52851 Enable/ Skip test case on MacCatalyst #74070
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Set CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Checked in corehost #74065
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74058
    community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert more jit phases to opt into common post phase checks #74041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for `$(PublishAot)` #74038
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc1] perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74089
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Vectorize {Last}IndexOf{Any}{Except} without code duplication #74086
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Handle endianness for character tests #74082
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Don't fail the test when the file is in use #74083
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SuperPMI collection fix by instantiating 'GetExactClasses' if it is null #74037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests failed in CI #73170
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Workload changes - account for SDK bands and use archives #74054
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] The `conv_ovf_i8_i.ilproj` is not supported the LA64. #74051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #74047
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #74043
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't set PublishAot in SDK by default #74048
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    area-System.Memory
  • Reword backport bot message #74077
  • Don't set PublishAot in SDK by default #74046
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove project dependency in System.Configuration.Tests.csproj #74016
    area-System.Configuration, test-bug
  • Add support for "known errors" to Fuzzlyn pipeline #73938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make FileInfo/DirectoryInfo.Name lazy #73983
    area-System.IO
  • Remove reflection from AppHostUpdateTests #73988
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #73955
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Bump main branding to 8.0 #73985
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #74024
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #74029
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #74023
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Disable the ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test for NativeAOT #74019
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74031
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    community-contribution
  • Add jit stress random #73859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • Try to keep cache value after startup validation when current Options is default unnamed one #72927
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move X.509 certificate tests under S.S.Cryptography #74033
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations on generic math interfaces #74025
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Net7 workload changes #74018
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ABI for Int128 #73601
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Workload changes - account for SDK bands and use archives #73981
    area-Infrastructure-mono
